product_name: CycleAware Up Top Handlebar Bag - Girls'
long_description: For day-to-day transport and everyday jaunts, the CycleAware Up Top bike handlebar bag for girls' stashes small riding essentials in a stylish, easily accessible bag. Weather-resistant synthetic leather construction helps protect contents from splashes and moisture. Bag attaches easily and securely to handlebar via top tube straps with reflective highlights. Includes magnetic snap closures, ID sleeve, inner phone pocket and a Joy Ride heart charm. Reflective panel increases visibility in dim light.
short_description: For day-to-day transport and everyday jaunts, the CycleAware Up Top bike handlebar bag for girls' stashes small riding essentials in a stylish, easily accessible bag.
